title: Review: Zipp’s New 303 XPLR SW Gravel Wheelset is Designed for Wider Tires and Lower Pressures
content:
The Zipp 303 XPLR SW is fast. It’s fast off-road, it’s fast on-road, and it never asks you to think about the ride ahead.

Read the full article at Review: Zipp’s New 303 XPLR SW Gravel Wheelset is Designed for Wider Tires and Lower Pressures on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
